text: Watee bak Isa Neukheun le Tuhan Aneuk Mariyam peue na tapeugah Peue na tayue kheun bak manusia Gata bandua Tuhan kon Allah Gata ngon ma teuh takheun droe tuhan Geujaweub yohnyan Isa Ruhullah Maha Suci Droeneuh hana lon kheun Narit nyang kon-kon raya that salah Hana hak bak lon lonkheun naritnyan Meunyo na lonkheun Neuteupue sudah Peue nyang na bak lon dumpeue Neuteupue Di lon han meupeue peue nyang bak Allah Nyang Droeneuh pubuet hana lon teupue Droeneuh nyang teupue nyang hana leumah
